Package gui.model

Class LSButton

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.control.Control
javafx.scene.control.Labeled
javafx.scene.control.ButtonBase
javafx.scene.control.Button
gui.model.LSButton
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.scene.control.Skinnable
public class LSButton
extends javafx.scene.control.Button
This class provides buttons with a special design matching the theme of the game.
Author:
Judith

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    LSButton​(java.lang.String text, int height, int width, int layoutX, int layoutY, int fontSize)
    Constructs an object of the class LSButton with text on it and a nice background image by using the methode setButtonBackground().
    LSButton​(javafx.scene.image.Image image, int height, int width, int layoutX, int layoutY)
    Constructs an object of the class LSButton without text and background image, but with an individualized image, that is given to the method as a parameter.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void setButtonBackground​(int height, int width)
    Sets the background image by using the method getImage() of the class ImageManager, the final variable and the parameters.
    private void setButtonBackground​(javafx.scene.image.Image image)
    Sets the background image by using the image of the parameters.
    private void setButtonFont​(int fontSize)
    Sets the font of the button to Verdana and the size of the font to the parameter fontSize.
    private void setButtonLayout​(int height, int width, int layoutX, int layoutY)
    Defines the size and alignment of the button.

  • Field Details

    • IMAGE_PATH

      private final java.lang.String IMAGE_PATH
      String that saves the path to the background image of the button
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • LSButton

      public LSButton​(java.lang.String text, int height, int width, int layoutX, int layoutY, int fontSize)
      Constructs an object of the class LSButton with text on it and a nice background image by using the methode setButtonBackground().
      Parameters:
      text - text, that is shown on the button
      height - height of the button, handed to the methods setButtonLayout() and setButtonBackground()
      width - width of the button, handed to the methods setButtonLayout() and setButtonBackground()
      layoutX - distance on the x-axis from the top left corner, handed to the method setButtonLayout()
      layoutY - distance on the y-axis from the top left corner, handed to the method setButtonLayout()
      fontSize - size of the font, handed to the method setButtonFont()

    • LSButton

      public LSButton​(javafx.scene.image.Image image, int height, int width, int layoutX, int layoutY)
      Constructs an object of the class LSButton without text and background image, but with an individualized image, that is given to the method as a parameter.
      Parameters:
      image - image, that is shown on the button, handed to the method setButtonBackground()
      height - height of the button, handed to the method setButtonLayout()
      width - width of the button, handed to the method setButtonLayout()
      layoutX - distance on the x-axis from the top left corner, handed to the method setButtonLayout()
      layoutY - distance on the y-axis from the top left corner, handed to the method setButtonLayout()

  • Method Details

    • setButtonFont

      private void setButtonFont​(int fontSize)
      Sets the font of the button to Verdana and the size of the font to the parameter fontSize.
      Parameters:
      fontSize - size of the font on the button

    • setButtonLayout

      private void setButtonLayout​(int height, int width, int layoutX, int layoutY)
      Defines the size and alignment of the button. The alignment of the text is set to the center.
      Parameters:
      height - height of the button
      width - width of the button
      layoutX - distance on the x-axis from the top left corner
      layoutY - distance on the y-axis from the top left corner

    • setButtonBackground

      private void setButtonBackground​(int height, int width)
      Sets the background image by using the method getImage() of the class ImageManager, the final variable and the parameters.
      Parameters:
      height - height of the image (the same height as the button)
      width - width of the image (the same width as the button)

    • setButtonBackground

      private void setButtonBackground​(javafx.scene.image.Image image)
      Sets the background image by using the image of the parameters.
      Parameters:
      image - image, that is set as background
